getStatus().Description: Returns the status of this result. Use @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#Status#isSuccess_E@ to determine whether the call was successful, and @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#Status#getStatusCode_E@ to determine what the error cause was. Certain errors are due to failures that can be resolved by launching a particular intent. The resolution intent is available via @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#Status#getResolution_E@.

Returns: Status code resulting from the operation. The value is one of the constants in @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#CommonStatusCodes_E@ or specific to the APIs added to the @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient_E@.
getStatusCode().Description: Indicates the status of the operation.

Parameters: The message associated with this status, or null.
A pending intent that will resolve the issue when started, or null.
Status(int, java.lang.String, android.ap.Description: Creates a representation of the status resulting from a GoogleApiClient operation.
Status(int, java.lang.String, android.ap.FullName: public Status (int statusCode, String statusMessage, PendingIntent pendingIntent)

Parameters: An Activity context to use to resolve the issue. The activity's onActivityResult method will be invoked after the user is done. If the resultCode is @B_android#app#Activity#RESULT_OK_E@, the application should try to connect again.
The request code to pass to onActivityResult.
Throws: If the resolution intent has been canceled or is no longer able to execute the request.
startResolutionForResult(android.app.Act.Description: Resolves an error by starting any intents requiring user interaction. See @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#CommonStatusCodes#SIGN_IN_REQUIRED_E@, and @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#CommonStatusCodes#RESOLUTION_REQUIRED_E@.
startResolutionForResult(android.app.Act.FullName: public void startResolutionForResult (Activity activity, int requestCode)

isCanceled().Description: Returns true if the operation was canceled.

Returns: The pending intent to resolve the failure.
getResolution().Description: A pending intent to resolve the failure. This intent can be started with @B_android#app#Activity#startIntentSenderForResult_E@ to present UI to solve the issue.

hasResolution().Description: Returns true if calling @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#Status#startResolutionForResult_E@ will start any intents requiring user interaction.
